results.title: Simvastatin inhibits transforming growth factor-beta1-induced expression of type I collagen, CTGF, and alpha-SMA in keloid fibroblasts.
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Keloid</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007627 @@@Keloid@@@ fibroblasts were cultured and exposed to different concentrations of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in the presence of @GENE_TGFB1 @GENE_7040 @@@TGF-beta1@@@, and the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on @GENE_TGFB1 @GENE_7040 @@@TGF-beta1@@@-induced collagen and @GENE_CCN2 @GENE_1490 @@@CTGF@@@ production in @<m>DISEASE_Keloid</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007627 @@@keloid@@@ fibroblasts were determined.

citations.NLM: Mun JH, Kim YM, Kim BS, Kim JH, Kim MB, Ko HC. Simvastatin inhibits transforming growth factor-beta1-induced expression of type I collagen, CTGF, and alpha-SMA in keloid fibroblasts. Wound Repair Regen. 2014 Jan-Feb;22(1):125-33. PMID: 24471776
